item.title: Bond Traders Leaning on Fed Rate Cuts Eye US Jobs Data for Clues
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Bond traders seeking support for bets that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates later this month will closely watch Fridayâ€™s US employment report for November. The monthly snapshot of the labor market arrives as the market-implied odds of a quarter-point rate cut at the central...
